Uses of Interface
com.swirlds.platform.FastCopyable

  • Packages that use FastCopyable 
    Package Description
    com.swirlds.fs
    Provides advanced merkle tree optimized FastCopyable file-system functionality to the Swirlds platform.
    com.swirlds.map
    Provides advanced FastCopyable Map functionality to the Swirlds platform.
    com.swirlds.platform
    Provides the core Swirlds platform.

    • Uses of FastCopyable in com.swirlds.fs

      Classes in com.swirlds.fs that implement FastCopyable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FCFileSystem
      An advanced merkle tree optimized file system implementation.

    • Uses of FastCopyable in com.swirlds.map

      Classes in com.swirlds.map that implement FastCopyable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FCMap<K extends FastSerializable,V extends FastSerializable>
      Fast Copyable Map based implementation of the Map and FastCopyable interfaces, which maps keys to values; and can be copied and serialized in a way specific to the Swirlds platform.

    • Uses of FastCopyable in com.swirlds.platform

      Subinterfaces of FastCopyable in com.swirlds.platform 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  SwirldState
      A Swirld app is defined by creating two classes, one implementing SwirldMain, and the other SwirldState, such that:

      SwirldState has a no-argument constructor (called by Platform) All SwirldState variables are thread-safe and private All SwirldState methods are synchronized SwirldMain never modifies an object in SwirldState
      So, if SwirldState contains an array, and SwirldMain gets it through a getter method, then the developer is responsible for making sure SwirldMain never changes the contents of that array.
      static interface  SwirldState.SwirldState2
      Normally, an app must define a state class that implements SwirldState.
      Classes in com.swirlds.platform that implement FastCopyable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AddressBook
      The Address of every known member of the swirld.
      class  RandomExtended
      A class similar to Random, but with extra methods to clone it and add entropy, and without thread safety.
      Methods in com.swirlds.platform with type parameters of type FastCopyable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T extends FastCopyable>
      T[]      		 Utilities.readFastCopyableArray​(FCDataInputStream stream, Class<T> fastCopyableClass)
      read a FastCopyable array from the given stream
      Methods in com.swirlds.platform that return FastCopyable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      FastCopyable FastCopyable.copy()
      If a class ExampleClass implements the FastCopyable interface, and an object x is of class ExampleClass, then x.copy() instantiates and returns a new ExampleClass object containing the same data as x.
      FastCopyable RandomExtended.copy()
